title: Simmering Jams at the Edge of the Forest - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   Cooking   Female Protagonist   Heterochromia   Kingdoms   Magic   Mute Character   Reincarnated in Another World   Spirits   Transmigration
author: Kobato Kosuzu   小鳩子鈴
description: A 30 something Margaret was summoned to a different world as a special being called “Spirit Orison”. However, what was waiting there was a rural life in the countryside, which was the complete opposite of her previous life. Meeting a gentle old lady, we will start a cheerful and delicious slow life surrounded by warm people.>
